name: Chopped Tomato Salad with Croutons
description: Adding white kidney beans to this classic Italian salad recipe is a great way to complete the meal with 20 g of protein per serving.
preparation: Place cut bread on Sheet Pan, drizzle with olive oil, and add dressing mix. Stir to combine. Toast for 3–4 min until crispy.
Combine dressing ingredients in small bowl and set aside.
Assemble by placing lettuce, beans, quartered tomatoes, toasted bread, and sliced red onion on 4 serving plates; drizzle with dressing and top with fresh, torn basil. Enjoy!

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: A classic for a reason, this dressing mix is full of flavour and uber versatile. Use it as salad or nourish bowl dressing, marinade protein including chicken and beef, or glaze grilled veggies and fresh fruit. Any way you serve it, it’s sure to be a hit!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
